name: Dungeon Master (itch) (FloyDnt)
description:
• The player's task is to pass the level to the end. The player has several options for playing. He can find all keys and open all doors. Or defeat all opponents. Or find a hook to cross the abyss.
  • The game is controlled by arrows.
  • Attack on Z. Hook on V.
  • Player Enemies: Skelets and Spikes.

The source code of the project can be viewed here: https://github.com/FloyDnt/Dungeon-Master

Create by FloyD (Nikita Terlyukevich).
